description: This is a straightforward cocktail recipe that tastes great. If you are looking for something quick and simple to enjoy at home, this is the perfect drink for you!
name: Tequila Tonic
recipeIngredient: 2 pcs. Lime wedges, plus more for serving

recipeInstructions.name: Fill a glass with ice. Add the tequila and squeeze in the lime wedges.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill a glass with ice. Add the tequila and squeeze in the lime wedges.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour in the tonic water. Serve with additional lime wedges.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the tonic water. Serve with additional lime wedges.
